assessments.status_rationale: Outcome depends on relative performance through 2025-10-31 close; no conclusive intel vs. SOXX performance evidence in today's news.
No trading-day count information for NTSK relative to its IPO price; the window runs through 2025-10-31.
No announcement from Google or PayPal about an AI agent shopping pilot with PayPal/Braintree was reported today.
No data on the 10Y–2Y Treasury spread reaching -0.10 pp or higher was provided; the period remains open.
No Drewry Shanghai–New York spot rate update was cited; evaluation depends on weekly readings through 2025-10-31.
Euro area flash HICP for September 2025 has not been released yet (due 2025-09-30).
September 2025 retail sales are scheduled for 2025-10-16; no preliminary figures in today's coverage.
Tokyo core CPI for September 2025 is due by 2025-10-04; no data reported yet.
GfK UK Consumer Confidence for October 2025 is not out yet (due by 2025-10-25).
No EIA weekly crude oil production figures reaching ≥13.4 mb/d were mentioned; the window remains open through late October.
No OFAC actions under the Venezuela sanctions program were reported today; deadline is 2025-10-31.
